start.cmd: I try to be helpful, but can be sassy. I may also pop in to add a quip ;)```md

card.long:
Provide a card name and I'll return the card's text as well as its picture. Without a card, I'll return a random card
You can provide ``--type=`` for card type or ``--tribe=`` for a Tribe (no space after =).

fullart.long: You provide a card name, I'll look for its full art.

find.short: returns a list of card names
find.long: I'll search for names that contain the letters you provide.

banlist.long:
Ask me about the banlist or why a card is/should be banned.
Some of my answers are snarky, so you can add ``--serious`` for a proper explaination.

good.short: takes a card type, or a tribe and type
good.long:
Asking about good cards? What'cha looking for?
I can give by type, or if you need something more specific: by build point or tribe.
``!good M'arrillian Creatures``
 ``!good Attacks 1``

rulebook.long:
You can ask for a different different rulebooks. If you don't tell me otherwise, I'll return the equivalent of ``!rulebook EN AU``
For a list of all rulebooks I have, type ``!rulebook --list``

starters.long: I'll provide a list of starter decks. Default are Afjak's TCO starter decks, but you can add --king or --metal for different ones.

rule.short: returns the definition of the rule

rate.short: Rate's a Creature based on its stats.

tribe.short: You can join you're favorite tribe (or lack thereof)! You can only be loyal to one... but you can always switch
tribe.long:
Here are the tribes you can join:
 <:Dan:294942889337683968> Danian, <:Mip:294941790052679690> Mipedian, <:Mar:294942283273601044> M'arrillian, <:OW:294939978897555457> OverWorld, <:UW:294943282943885313> UnderWorld, <:TL:294945357392248833> Tribeless

end.cmd: ```You can ask me more about specific commands ``c!help <command>``.

command.long: This is for when you need help with my help
